name: Press Space to FIX this World
name_original: Press Space to FIX this World
description:
This game is made for Weekly Game Jam 104

__________________________________________________________________

World is getting worse because of people's carelessness. Global warming, forest fires,

poor and hungry people, extinxt animals etc. are problems of this times. But now you

can fix this world with one key. Press space to FIX this world.

__________________________________________________________________

Game is not compeleted yet. New minigames will add soon.

(Sorry for my english :) )
